description: This file defines a theming class 'AppTheme' for a Flutter application, which centralizes the application's visual theme using a specified color palette. It provides a light theme with custom styles for various UI components like AppBar, FloatingActionButton, BottomNavigationBar, Card, and input decorations.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A class that provides centralized theming for the Flutter application, specifically a static getter for light theme data.

methods.name: lightTheme
methods.description: A static getter that returns a ThemeData object configured with a custom color scheme and styles for a modern Material 3-themed light mode.
